title: Chapter 4272 - Chapter 4272: The 4271 Massacre Began
body:
Chapter 4272 - Chapter 4272: The 4271 Massacre Began

Chapter 4272: The 4271 massacre began

Translator: 549690339

The experts of the Void dynasty did not know how powerful the palace was.

However, they had heard from the seniors of the royal family that it could withstand a heaven origin creation-level existence.

Now, they saw that the defense and attack system of the palace was completely useless against this intruder.

This made them extremely terrified!

“This is a divine dragon, a divine dragon from the nine-origin universe, the Divine Dragon recorded in the records of our Royal Family!”

An expert from the royal family stared at Wang Xian. Sensing this terrifying aura, he roared loudly!

“Damn it, an expert from the nine-origin universe actually dares to invade our void universe. You are courting death!”

An expert from the royal family roared at Wang Xian with a face full of anger!

“Defend! With the help of the power of our palace, we can unleash a strength that far surpasses that of ordinary powerhouses in the Heaven’s origin realm.”

They shouted loudly.

More than 200,000 powerhouses in the Dominator realm of the Void universe immediately gathered waves of terrifying energy and prepared to cover Wang Xian.

At the same time, the powerhouses around the palace also flew over quickly.

Their faces were filled with fighting spirit.

“Fight for the Void dynasty. Any intruders shall die!”

They roared loudly, wanting to protect their dynasty palace.

Wang Xian was floating in the sky above the palace. He stared at them coldly with a mocking expression on his face.

There were more than 200,000 experts at the ruler realm below.

There were over a million people who were rushing over from the surroundings!

One-third of them were masters of the ruler realm.

This was the power that guarded the palace of the Void dynasty!

More than 500,000 masters of the ruler realm.

This number was not small!

One had to know that this was merely the power that was gathered in the palace of the Void Dynasty!

The overall power of the entire void universe was still very powerful.

At the very least, it was much stronger than the nine-origin universe!

“Die!”

Wang Xian stared at them with a cold expression on his face.

He waved his dragon claws downwards.

“Roar! Roar! Roar!”

Below, more than 200,000 masters in the ruler realm were also staring at Wang Xian with cold eyes.

The combined space power attacked Wang Xian’s body.

“PFFT!”

However, their power was like a fragile mirror when faced with Wang Xian’s attack.

All the space power was destroyed by the Dragon Claw!

Following that, the power of death descended on their bodies!

“This is bad. The opponent’s strength is too terrifying. He might be an existence at the Great Dao Level!”

“He’s Invincible!”

Sensing this invincible power, some of the powerhouses at the peak of the Overlord realm of the royal family roared with Trembling Hearts!

Boom

However, in the next moment, the terrifying dragon claws directly suppressed over 200,000 powerhouses at the ruler realm.

They were all killed!

With a wave of his arm, Wang Xian collected all their corpses!

Then, he swept his gaze across the surroundings.

He swept his gaze toward the Void dynasty’s powerhouse disciples who were charging toward him!

“Ants!”

He said coldly and swept his dragon tail across!

“We are invincible! Run!”

“We seek help from his majesty, the Sacred King! We seek help from the nation-guarding dukes and Generals!”

All the Void Dynasty’s elite soldiers who were flying toward him saw what was happening.

They were overwhelmed with shock as they shouted in horror!

The elite disciples who were originally charging toward him immediately fled in fear.

“Hehe!”

Wang Xian stared at them with a mocking expression on his face.

Could they escape?

The terrifying dragon tail had already swept across. Endless nine-colored energy was attacking their bodies.

Faced with this terrifying energy torrent, they had no way of resisting at all!

Death enveloped them instantly!

They didn’t even have the chance to scream!

They were all dead!

Wang Xian flew over and collected all the corpses!

The corpses of these 500,000 Void Universe Masters were a huge resource!

“Roar!”

Wang Xian let out a dragon’s roar as he sensed the energy in the palace of the Void dynasty.

Where there was a strong energy fluctuation, he waved his dragon claw and kept it!

Especially at the back of the Palace of the Void dynasty, there was a large number of divine trees and herbs planted there.

There was also an extremely powerful mountain formed from the accumulation of Void Stones!

“There are a total of 300,000 to 400,000 divine trees in the ruler realm!”

Wang Xian’s heart was burning with excitement. There were also quite a number of divine trees in the peak of the ruler realm!

There was even a pond there that contained a vast amount of energy!

This energy was close to the strength of a heaven’s origin creator!

It was definitely a powerful treasure!

Wang Xian’s heart was burning with passion. He moved his body and kept it away.

This pond was obviously sealed by a powerful energy.

However, this energy could not withstand Wang Xian’s strength!

“Roar!”

After Wang Xian kept it away, he kept a large number of divine herbs, divine trees, and spatial gemstones!

All sorts of valuable treasures were plundered!

A large number of treasures were stored away in just a few minutes!

Boom! Boom

Roar! Roar

After some useful treasures were stored away, Wang Xian hovered above the palace. He spewed out a mouthful of dragon breath downwards!

The terrifying torrent of energy caused the palace to collapse and penetrated it directly!

Countless fragments flew in all directions!

The items used to create the palace were not ordinary items either!

However, Wang Xian still did not care about these materials!

Under the Dragon Breath.

The entire palace began to collapse rapidly!

Some of the Void dynasty’s strong disciples who hid in the palace also died under the impact of the energy!

“Hiss, look at our palace, what’s going on? What’s going on?”

“What happened? What happened? That huge creature is wreaking havoc in our palace!”

“Where’s our sacred king? Where’s Our Void Dynasty’s Heavenly Yuan Creation Realm Expert?”

“Oh my God, the palace is rapidly collapsing, and all the experts in the palace were killed. What kind of creature is that? How could it be so terrifying?”

“How could it be? There’s actually a powerful existence attacking our palace!”

At the same time, around the palace of the Void dynasty.

As the palace of the Void dynasty, there were many experts entering and leaving every day.

All sorts of royal families and ministers of the dynasty would enter and leave frequently!

At this moment, some who had just arrived and some who had just left the palace.

Looking at the situation in the palace, their faces were filled with shock!

That terrifying gigantic creature was like a world-destroying devil, wreaking havoc in their dynasty palace!

This was their Void Dynasty’s Palace!

A dynasty palace that had stood erect in their universe for hundreds of billions of years!

Today, it was actually destroyed wantonly by a powerful existence!
